name: Grip
description:
Jump from ring to ring and onto your opponent to make them fall in this fast-paced fighting game.  Collect energy drinks to maintain your stamina. Use trampolines for a one-time save.

Controls

Player 1

A / D - Move left or right.

W - Jump, only if you're holding onto a ring. Start the game with this button.

Player 2

left / right - Move left or right.

up - Jump, only if you're holding onto a ring. Start the game with this button.
